user.title: Disable Notifications (From a Specific User)
user.sub: Please go to User Menu > Filter to disable notifications from a specific user.
user.note: *Please restart the app after you have changed user-specific notification settings.

page1.L1: KnzkApp is a Mastodon client originally created to display BBCode (Text Decorations) of knzk.me in a mobile app.
page1.L2: With the current version of KnzkApp, you can even use special features of other popular instances right from KnzkApp.

page2.L1: In KnzkApp, you can easily toot from the toot box at the bottom of the timeline.
page2.L2: You can tap on this toot box to launch edit screen. Press a button to show details of that button.

alert.menu: Display menu for accessing settings, etc.
alert.toot: Post your toot using this button
alert.privacy: Edit toot privacy settings with this button.
alert.local_only: When enabled, your toot will be shown only in LTL (and not FTL). *Limited instances only
alert.emoji: Add your favorite emojis with this button.
alert.deco_box: Additional features will be displayed in this box.
alert.bbcode: Add BBCode with this button. *Limited instances only
alert.doodle: You can doodle anything with this button. Since all doodles are uploaded as a picture, you can use this in any instance.
alert.cw: Turn on Content Warning (CW) with this button.
alert.enquete: Create a poll with this button. *Limited instances only

page3.L1: You can swipe or tap the arrow at top left/right to switch between timelines.

page4.L2: If you have any problems or suggestions, please feel free to contact (@y@knzk.me)!

starting.error_acct: A problem occurred. Please switch your account
